_header: We find written of Saint Bernard
_description: Pater noster for St. Bernard’s palfrey, a Narratio in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
We find writen of saynte bernardeþat anes fore to a cytee
                    warde…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Oure lorde fullfill oure langyngeAnd till his blisse he vs
                    all bringe Amen .
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
WE fynde I write þat seynt BernardEode enes to a Cite
                    ward…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Vre lord folfulle vre longyngeAnd to his blisse vs alle
                    brynge
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Pater noster for seynt bernardes palfray (f.
                    180vb)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.
BodEngPoeta1.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Die Evangelien-Geschichten der Homiliensammlung des Ms. Vernon.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         57 (1877): 241-316: 261.

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
We fynde wryten þat saint barnardWent a tyme to a cety
                    ward…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Oure lorde fullfill oure langyngeAnd to þe blys of heuen
                    vs brynge

BLHar2391.First Lines: We fynd wretyn of Sayn barnardeþat ones to a cyte he farde…
BLHar2391.Last Lines: …Owr lord fulfyld owre longyngAnd tyll hys blys he vs all bryng
BLHar2391.Attributed Title: Dominica in quinquagesima (left margin, f. 173), plus “A tale” written above this

BLHar4196.First Lines: We find wretin of saint bernardHow he went vnto a cete ward…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And heue oure hertes in heuyn kingþan will he grant vs oure asking
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.28-30.

MinULZ822.First Lines:
We fynde wrytene þat saynte barnardeWente a tyme till a cyte
                    warde…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…oure lorde fulfyll oure langyngeand tyll hys blys vs all
                    brynge
